div.head: 帶下十二疾
div.div: twelve types of ailments below the belt

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: twelve types of ailments below the belt

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dai xia bing 帶下病 , diseases below the belt. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry mu gou yin jing 牡狗陰莖：除女子帶下十二疾 , “It eliminates the twelve types of ailments below the belt in women”.
